DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the therapeutic effects health benefits, and immunological effect of Nigella sativa in children with beta thalassemia major.
DOC.brief_title: Benefits of Nigella Sativa in Children With Beta Thalassemia Major
DOC.detailed_description: Study will be carried on children patients with Î²- thalassemia major attending The Hematology Unit of Pediatric Department at Tanta University Hospital. patients are divided into 2 groups: patients in the control group, patients in the treatment group that will receive nigella sativa powder for 3 consecutive months. Then Evaluate the therapeutic effects health benefits, and immunological effect of Nigella sativa in children with beta thalassemia major. Evaluate the extent of clinical improvement, reductions in serum iron and ferritin, antioxidant status, treatment of the causes of hemolysis and other therapeutic benefits of Nigella sativa in those patient.
DOC.criteria: Thalassemia with iron overload Thalassemia complicated with diabetes mellitus or hepatitis Patients who discontinue treatment
